name: CW Pricing Table For Elementor
author: Curl Ware

sections.description:
CW Pricing Table For Elementor is one of the best addons for enhancing Elementor Free with advanced Pricing Table features. Our widgets are highly customizable and offer unique design flexibility, distinguishing them from other third-party Elementor addons.

Features:

  • Free widgets, including Card, Slider, Carousel, and Pricing Table.
  • Enhances design skills and offers extensive customization options.

Useful Links:

  • Demo
  • Documentation
  • Video Tutorials
  • Support
  • Share Idea

Stay connected with our Community:
Join the CW Pricing Table For Elementor addons community to share your thoughts and get support for your web design work.

Missing Features?
We welcome your ideas! Check out our public roadmap to submit and upvote features you’d like to see in future updates. Submit your ideas here.

Use of 3rd Party Resources

  • Font Awesome Free v5.8.1
  • Owl Carousel v2.3.4
  • Modernizr 2.8.3
  • Bootstrap v5.3.0
sections.installation:
Step 1: Upload the plugin file via Plugins ➔ Add New ➔ Upload Plugin ➔ Choose File, or search for “CW Pricing Table Addons” in the plugin directory via Plugins ➔ Add New ➔ Search.

Step 2: After installation, click the “activate” button to enable CW Pricing Table For Elementor.

For detailed installation instructions, refer to our documentation: How to Install CW Pricing Table For Elementor

Privacy Policy

We do not collect any sensitive data.

Donate
If you find our plugin useful, please consider donating to support its development.
sections.faq:
Compatibility

  • Works seamlessly with other Elementor Addons, offering additional features like Happy Effects.
  • Compatible with any WordPress theme that supports Elementor, especially optimized for Hello Elementor.
  • Compatible with Elementor Pro.

Update Safety

  • Our updates won’t break your site or any pages using our plugin. We prioritize stability and recommend backing up your site before updating.
